title: The Worm Ouroboros
description: Wonders without end. A high epic of royal revenge and romance, wizardry and warfare... and a quest that has no end!His freedom from the overlordship of Witchland won in a fair fight, Lord Juss of Demonland was nearly slain by the treacherous wizardry of the Witch-King Gorice... and Juss's brother, Goldry Bluszco, was spirited away from the sight of men.To rescue Goldry Bluszco and destroy forever the power of Witchland, Juss had but the tattered remnants of his army, and two heroes to fight by his side - and a night-sent vision that laid it on him to dare the dread slopes of Koshtra Belorn... the slopes that few had looked on and none had conquered."The Worm Ouroboros" weaves the red thread of blood, the golden thread of romance, the black thread of dire sorcery and treason with the warm hues of high adventure and daring into a fantastic tapestry that unrolls richly in never-ending wonder and delight!"A litereary event of the first importance" - Orville Prescott
author: E.R. Eddison
